name: Huasui Chinese Restaurant
description: Huasui is yet another Chinese restaurant to join the many we've got in Colombo. The ambience is pretty pleasant and the food is nothing amazing compared to the flavour and portions in other Chinese restaurants, but it is good.
review:
Huasui is yet another Chinese restaurant to join the many we've got in Colombo. The ambience is pretty pleasant and the food is nothing amazing compared to the flavour and portions in other Chinese restaurants, but it is good.

අපිට හුරුපුරුදු ශ්‍රී ලංකන් චයිනීස් ඇහෙන් බැලුවොත් නම් 'හුආසුයි' අවන්හලේ Seafood fried rice එක මෙලෝ රහක් නෑ
